title.rendered: New Fresh Start Guidelines Announced. Do you qualify?

content.rendered: The IRS Offer in Compromise is the most sought-after tax debt resolution. It’s a settlement offer that can significantly reduce your tax liability. How do you know if you qualify? The IRS just announced new guidelines for its Fresh Start Program, which means you’re more likely to qualify now than ever before! CEO David King, and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang discuss everything you need to know about the new guidelines.
